title: Simulation-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Course for MOOC Development and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience Operating Online Education Platforms and Foundational Knowledge in Secondary-Level Science Education
context.additional_context: An intensive course for in-service science teachers to acquire technical and design competencies required for MOOC production and operation, experiencing real platform management scenarios through VR simulations

learning_goals: One can prepare a content plan according to the MOOC development process, aligned with instructional design standards.
One can produce VR-based science experiment content in a simulation environment, considering platform technical limitations.
One can design a practical protocol to resolve operational issues among multiple stakeholders (institution-instructor-technology team) using collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
